articles.title: This man may be one of few senior Trump figures to leave with his reputation enhanced
articles.description: If all goes to plan, a Moroccan-born, trilingual former pharmaceutical executive may be one of the few senior figures to escape the Trump administration with his reputation enhanced.

articles.description: Talks over a new $900 billion stimulus package are intensifying on Capitol Hill. CNN's Manu Raju reports President Donald Trump now says that he supports the proposal.

articles.title: Trump shows how to get away with almost anything
articles.description: One of Donald Trump's services to history will be to underscore just how much the integrity of the presidency depends on the character of its incumbent.

articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar rolls the tape on the many GOP senators who immediately congratulated President Donald Trump after his 2016 win, but have not acknowledged Joe Biden as president-elect, saying they're waiting for "the process to play out."

articles.title: Watch one of the world's most powerful telescopes collapse
articles.description: The Arecibo Observatory telescope in Puerto Rico collapsed just weeks after engineers decided it was too dangerous to repair.
